blog.name: phanfictioncatalogue
blog.title: phanfiction catalogue
blog.description:
mobile users, click here!

please refer to our FAQ first.

Our goal is to create an alphabetized library of every phanfiction in the phandom. Besides that, we compile masterlists of different genres that are scheduled for posting every few days, and help find fics that have been mislocated.

title: Monthly Follower Recs
body:
Follower recommendations of March 2019.

Anonymous

California (ao3) - dualmoons

Summary: After a successful turn-over in the company’s business, a result caused by Phil, he is awarded the car as a gift from his father who happens to be head of the entire company. Thrilled to drive the car again, Phil gladly volunteers to have a short business meeting with the owner of a successful 1960’s diner in the heart of the city.

Working four days a week in a uniform consisting of a red and white aesthetic and rollerskates, Daniel Howell is a Business Uni student with an abusive boyfriend and an immense love for 80’s cult classic movies. When working a typical shift, Dan trips up and nearly tumbles to the floor but gets caught by the boy with jet black hair and stunning crystal blue eyes. The simple beginnings of an extraordinary friendship.

dip and pip domestic fluff (ao3) - itsmyusualphannie (itsmyusualday)

Summary: Why do homework when you can write about two idiots being in love?

Do You Know How in Love With You I Am (Please Notice) (ao3) - phantasticworks

Summary: Based on a Phan!The Office AU drawing by @laurainlilac on tumblr

Dan works at a small paper company, but the brightside to this boring career is that his best friend Phil is just a few feet away at reception. The downside to this is that he’s hopelessly, irrevocably in love with said best friend. Oh, and Phil is engaged, too.

A short little story about best friends, being in love, and pining hopelessly after the boy you think you can’t have. But, don’t worry, there’s a happy ending in here somewhere.

Like A Computer (ao3) - starboydjh

Summary: Dan’s brain is like a computer and needs to reboot itself sometimes. It just so happens that his brain needs to reboot when Dan’s home alone with Phil’s parents during their Christmas trip to the Lester home base.

Partners (ao3) - wingdingsphil

Summary: Dan and Phil, mutual enemies, are partnered for a term long project. They finish it in the first week, and discover they have way more in common than they thought.

Pat A Cake, Pat A Cake (ao3) - thelesterhowells

Summary: Dan and Phil bake a cake for Martyn’s birthday.

Phil Lester, The Spy who Shagged Me (ao3) - CactiPhan

Summary: Phil’s assignment is to kill an enemy spy at a bar at Paris, he just so ends up meeting a boy at the bar who gets mixed up in the whole mess and is now possibly in danger.

Scared To Fall (ao3) - writingwannabe

Summary: It’s Dan Howell’s last year of high school, but he’s on the edge. As a way to make bullying stop, he tried to erase all his individuality, repressing who he really is in favour of blending in. Naturally, that hasn’t been good for him, but he doesn’t know how to stop.

In comes Phil Lester, a uni student running some creative writing classes at Dan’s school for extra credit. An unlikely friendship blossoms, and he helps Dan to see the world in a very different light.

Strings Attached (ao3) - wekingsandprettythings

Summary:
person A: hey i don’t want to ruin the friendship but i really wanna tap that ass
person B: ruin it.

Will You Be There in the Morning? (ao3) - celeistic

Summary (tw): Dan smoking isn’t something new to Phil, in fact he’s done it with him before. But it’s been quite a while. This time around Dan and Phil talk about something they don’t really talk about.

Your Mess Is Mine (ao3) - Lizzyboo

Summary: A university!au where Dan is a third year student dealing with demons from his past, and Phil is the peculiar guy from his Greek mythology class who he just can’t quite get out of his mind.

reblog.comment:

blog.name: dramaphan
blog.title: Yo I Comment On The Drama When Shit Hits The Fan
blog.description:
Phandom drama? It's more likely than you think.

.

My ask box is always open if you need a place to be dramatic, share theories, conspiracies, opinions, or general grievances. Fire away, my babies. Nothing is off limits. (Except for the things that are.)

.

Icon by phanniephobic, header by cinnamonnutlester

summary: Do you think Easter baking this year will just be Phil stuck sitting on a chair in the naughty corner by himself making cookies...
question: Do you think Easter baking this year will just be Phil stuck sitting on a chair in the naughty corner by himself making cookies by balancing a toaster oven on his lap?
answer: Easter baking 2019: Phil vlogs himself going to the store and buying cookies from the grocery store bakery.

reblog.comment: Easter baking 2019: Phil vlogs himself going to the store and buying cookies from the grocery store bakery.

blog.name: thedemonphanti
blog.title: thedemonphanti
blog.description: Treat People With Respect | Unpopular Opinions Welcome

summary: Where are youu? :( I miss your opinions. What do you think about Dan's recent tweet? Do you think it was actually worrying or...
question: Where are youu? :( I miss your opinions. What do you think about Dan's recent tweet? Do you think it was actually worrying or just his usual humor? Do you think he only tweets every couple days to show hes still active and then leaves for another couple days? Tell me your thoughts 😂😂💕
answer: Hi! Don’t worry, I still exist. I just felt like taking a little break from social media. I’ll answer all the asks in my inbox, it might just take me a bit! This is a few days late at this point, but I don’t think Dan’s tweet was worrying. At least half of being an adult is joking about keeping it together while trying to keep it together. I think it’s just his humor. If that makes some people really anxious, he might not be the best person to follow because it’s just how he is. I avoid him on days I’m feeling particularly anxious to be honest. I don’t actually believe Dan is back either. I’ll believe it when I see it. When he posted that first selfie I waited to see if it had something to do with merch and lo and behold, within a few minutes I saw someone post about the store site being down and then someone posted the merch newsletter followed by Phil’s Instagram story. I am not saying people shouldn’t enjoy the picture, but I do think that rather than saying “I’m back!” it was him saying “I have a fiduciary responsibility to my company and the people employed there so I am going to do what is required of me and post a picture to assure people they aren’t buying merch for a dead brand.” I personally wouldn’t spend my money on any of their merch at this point, with so much up in the air, but I usually don’t buy merch anyway, so if that’s what people want to spend their money on, more power to them I guess. I just see a lot of people who really don’t seem to pick up on the connection between when Dan posts these days, which is the bare minimum, and that he is usually doing it when Phil is trying to promote things. My fear is that this will just start the whole cycle of people being angry at Dan for not meeting their expectations over and over again continually. I think Dan is fine. He made a ton of money last year and is taking time for himself. If and when he decides to come back to YouTube, I’m sure he will let us know. Until then, my advice to everyone is to keep their expectations as low as possible! If you manage your expectations well, you won’t be disappointed, but you might be pleasantly surprised.

title: can't even get it started

by palomeheart

Phil contemplates his first video of 2014, the new direction of his channel, and a video he won’t make.

Written for the PFF Shuffle Mode fest, for the song prompt Disturbia by Rihanna.

Words: 2543, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Phandom/The Fantastic Foursome (YouTube RPF)

  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply

blog.name: phanfeed-ao3
blog.title: Phanfiction!
blog.description:
!!! READ THE FAQ BEFORE SENDING ME AN ASK !!!

Mobile Links

This blog is autoposts anything that gets put in the Dan Howell/Phil Lester tag on Archive of Our Own (AO3).

Sometimes the applet on IFTT I use straight up breaks. I don't recommend turning on notifications for this blog. Links don't work on mobile.

Admin: Ozzy (foolishdeadbeat)
